mapper.insert: insert into team (team_id, name, description, create_time, create_user_id, status, manager_id) values (#{teamId}, #{name}, #{description}, #{createTime}, #{createUserId}, #{status}, #{managerId})
mapper.select: select team_id, team.name as team_name, manager.name as manager_name, team.status, team.create_time, manager_id, description from team inner join user_info manager on team.manager_id = manager.user_id where team.team_id=#{teamId}
mapper.insert: insert into my_team (user_id, team_id, status) values (#{userId}, #{teamId}, #{status})
mapper.select:
select team_id, team.name as team_name, manager.name as manager_name, team.status from team inner join user_info manager on team.manager_id = manager.user_id where 1 = 1 and team.name like concat('%',#{nameKey},'%') and team.status=#{teamStatus}
and manager_id<>#{currentUserId}
mapper.insert: insert into apply_team (apply_team_log_id, apply_team_id, apply_user_id, apply_remark, create_time) values (#{applyTeamLogId}, #{applyTeamId},#{applyUserId}, #{applyRemark}, #{createTime})
mapper.select: select apply_team_log_id, apply_team_id, apply_user_id, apply_user.name as apply_user_name, create_user_id, manager_id, create_user.name as create_user_name, manager_user.name as manager_user_name, apply_team.create_time, team.name as apply_team_name, process_result from ((((apply_team inner join team on team_id = apply_team_id) inner join user_info apply_user on apply_user_id = user_id) inner join user_info create_user on create_user_id = create_user.user_id) inner join user_info manager_user on manager_user.user_id = manager_id) where 1=1 and ( manager_id=#{userId} or apply_user_id=#{userId} ) order by apply_team.create_time desc

select apply_team_log_id, apply_team_id, apply_user_id, apply_user.name as apply_user_name, create_user_id, manager_id, create_user.name as create_user_name, manager_user.name as manager_user_name, apply_team.create_time, team.name as apply_team_name, apply_remark, process_result, process_remark, process_time, process_user_id, process_user.name as process_user_name, process_read_time, read_time from (((((apply_team inner join team on team_id = apply_team_id) inner join user_info apply_user on apply_user_id = user_id) inner join user_info create_user on create_user_id = create_user.user_id) inner join user_info manager_user on manager_user.user_id = manager_id) left outer join user_info process_user on process_user.user_id=process_user_id) where 1 = 1 and apply_team_log_id=#{applyId}
